sources.title: Messiah of Evil (1974)
sources.description: A young woman searching for her missing artist father finds herself in the strange seaside town of Point Dune, which seems to be under the influence of a mysterious undead cult. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/messiah-of-evil-1974/

sources.title: Messiah of Evil (1973) ZOMBIE
sources.description:
Stars: Michael Greer, Marianna Hill and Joy Bang
Writer/Director: Willard Huyck

A young woman goes searching for her missing artist father. Her journey takes her to a strange Californian seaside town governed by a mysterious undead cult. Also known as DEAD PEOPLE

sources.title: Messiah of Evil (1974) Influenced by the Mysterious Undead Cult | Full Horror Movie
sources.description:
Arletty goes searching for her missing artist father. Her journey takes her to a eerie Californian seaside town, upon arrival she finds herself in the midst of a series of bizarre incidents, where she uncovers the town's mysterious undead cult, including a prophesied return of a vampiric "Messiah of Evil," Arletty is drawn into a terrifying struggle for survival and the spreading of a dangerous new religion & undead horrors.

Original title: Messiah of Evil (1974) 
Alternative titles: Revenge of the Screaming Dead, Messiah of Evil: The Second Coming, Zumbis do Mal, Ο Μεσίας του Διαβόλου, Ο Μεσσίας του Διαβόλου, Messiah of the Evil Dead, Blood Busters, Messias des Bösen, 邪魔的弥赛亚, Messia del diavolo, Месията на злото, Мессия зла, 데드 피플, メサイア・オブ・デッド, メシア・オブ・ザ・デッド

Directors & Writers:  Willard Huyck, Gloria Katz
Main Cast: 
Michael Greer as Thom
Marianna Hill as Arletty 
Joy Bang as Toni
Royal Dano as Joseph Lang
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Horror


Chapters
00:00 Full movie
01:55 A woman recounts a terrifying experience in a small coastal town.
05:13 A stranger arrives in Pointe Dume, seeking answers about the town's dark past.
10:50 The protagonist delves deeper into the town's secrets, uncovering disturbing truths.
16:19 A local shares chilling tales of the town's history and a mysterious cult.
20:46 The protagonist faces increasing danger as they investigate their father's disappearance.
24:04 A group of travelers arrives in Pointe Dume, unaware of the horrors that await them.
29:18 Tensions rise among the group as they navigate the town's sinister atmosphere.
33:50 Strange occurrences and eerie encounters intensify, blurring the lines between reality and nightmare.
41:45 The protagonist's sanity begins to unravel as they confront the cult's influence.
47:58 The truth about the protagonist's father and his connection to the cult is revealed.
54:56 A horrifying transformation takes place, marking the climax of the film.
1:06:58 Survivors of the cult's attacks share their harrowing experiences.
1:11:28 The protagonist delivers a final warning about the cult's growing power.
1:19:30 A haunting conclusion, leaving the audience with a sense of dread and uncertainty.

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: After losing contact with her artist father, Arletty travels to the west coast. Though she doesn't find him, she meets Thom, an odd wealthy man who's travelling with 2 lovers, Toni and Laura, to meet her father. She reads his diary and realises there's something strange with the residents of this California town.
metadata.Actors: Michael Greer, Marianna Hill, Joy Bang
